# Project Context & Standards
# This file provides a map of the project's documentation for AI agents.

# Global Entry Point
- [Master Standards](master_standards.md) - START HERE. Defines the persona, chain of thought, and document hierarchy.

# Core Standards (The "What")
- [Architecture Standards](architecture_standards.md) - The Five-View Architecture framework.
- [Security Standards](security_standards.md) - OWASP/NIST controls and security requirements.
- [Testing Standards](testing_standards.md) - Testing strategies, pyramids, and quality gates.
- [Operations Standards](ops_standards.md) - CI/CD, observability, and deployment rules.
- [Documentation Standards](documentation_standards.md) - ADRs, READMEs, and code comments.
- [API Standards](api_standards.md) - RESTful API design and implementation principles.
- [Frontend Standards](frontend_standards.md) - User interface and frontend application standards.
- [Data Standards](data_standards.md) - Data modeling and database standards.
- [Tools Standards](tools_standards.md) - Enterprise tool selection and usage guidelines.
- [Common Scenarios](common_scenarios.md) - Guidelines for common development scenarios.
- [Forbidden Standards](forbidden_standards.md) - Universally banned coding patterns.

# Language Implementations (The "How")
- [Python Standards](languages/python/master_standards.md) - Python-specific implementation details.
- [TypeScript Standards](languages/typescript/master_standards.md) - TypeScript-specific implementation details.
